TopicTitle: No crash damage cheat makes vehicle unrecoverable

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel | GPU: Intel Core i12-12600 | RAM: 32GB

 

Severity = Very Low

Frequency: Consistent

Description: I was crash landing on Kerbin (due to a different issue which I need to figure out how to replicate) so I turned on no crash damage. The vehicle hit the ground, bounced all over the place and stopped but was unrecoverable. It became recoverable when I toggled No Crash Damage back off.

Edited December 20, 2023 by The Space Peacock
